realitycheck.title: Reality Check
realitycheck.about: Options trading can become a real addiction, as can any other activity pushed to its limits. To avoid the danger of such an addiction, we provide a reality-check that gives you a summary of your trades and accounts on a regular basis.
realitycheck.interval_question: Please specify your preferred reality-check interval in minutes:
realitycheck.interval_error: Please enter a number between 10 to 120.

newaccountmaltainvest.info: The financial trading services contained within this site are only suitable for customers who are able to bear the loss of all the money they invest and who understand and have experience of the risk involved in the acquistion of financial contracts. Transactions in financial contracts carry a high degree of risk. If purchased contracts expire worthless, you will suffer a total loss of your investment, which consists of the contract premium.

authentication.please_authenticate: Please authenticate your account to lift your withdrawal and trading limits.
authentication.documents: Please send the following documents to support@binary.com in order to verify your identity and authenticate your account:
authentication.proof_of_identity: Proof of identity - A scanned copy of your passport, driving license (either provisional or full), or identity card that shows your full name and date of birth.
authentication.proof_of_address: Proof of address - A scanned copy of a utility bill or bank statement that's not more than three months old.

restricted.please_contact: Your account is restricted. Kindly contact customer support for assistance.
